title: The Shawshank Redemption
synopsis: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Inception
synopsis: A skilled thief is given a chance at redemption if he can successfully perform an inception: planting an idea in someone's mind.

title: The Godfather
synopsis: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: Sinners
synopsis: A dark tale of seven strangers who must confront their deepest sins in a mysterious town that knows their secrets.

title: A Minecraft Movie
synopsis: In a blocky world of endless possibilities, a young hero must unite the realms to stop a powerful evil from destroying Minecraft.
